entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023
